1.title: The beggining

11.content:
Jackson laid down on his bed looking down at the cast on his leg he had broke his leg the other night when he helped his pack defeat a bunch of hunters normally his healing ability would of taking care of his injury but the hunters they had been fighting had used a special strain of wolf bane which took away his ability to heal for a couple of months. Jackson was board out of his mind there was nothing to do "Man I am so board "Thought Jackson but his thoughts where interrupted by his stomach growling "Better get something to eat"said Jackson as he texted his mum to bring him so food a couple of mintues later his mum walked in to the room carrying a big plate of food

"Here you go"said Jackson mum giving his plate

"Thanks mum "said Jackson as he started to eat and his mum left him to eat Jackson managed to eat all his food and was lying back rubbing his bloated belly but on the Brightside he wasn't board anymore "Maybe I should do that again"Thought Jackson texting his mum to bring him up some more

13.title: other options

info.brief_description: Jackson (Colton Haynes) from teen wolf starts to gain wieght!
info.description: Jackson (actor Colton Haynes) from MTV's Teen Wolf starts to gain weight for reasons that you can decide! Please no vore, sex and gay stuff is fine since it's 18+. No magic weight gain where he magically gains "3,000,000 pounds in a day!" because that's just lazy. Other than that have fun with the story and feel free to add! Thanks!!!
